meanings.definition: To make neat or tidy by clipping, paring, or pruning
meanings.sent1: She trims the bushes in her garden every weekend.
meanings.sent2: He trims his hair regularly to keep it looking neat.
meanings.sent3: The barber accidentally trims too much off the top, giving him a new look.
meanings.sent4: She trims away the dead leaves, revealing the healthy plant underneath.
meanings.sent5: The tailor trims the fabric with precision, creating a perfect fit.

meanings.definition: To remove excess or unwanted parts
meanings.sent1: He trims the fat off the meat before cooking it.
meanings.sent2: She trims the rough edges of the paper to make it smooth.
meanings.sent3: The chef trims the recipe down to its essential ingredients.
meanings.sent4: He trims the unnecessary details from the report to make it concise.
meanings.sent5: She trims the overgrown branches to improve the tree's health.

meanings.definition: A decorative addition or border, often made of fabric or ribbon
meanings.sent1: The dress had beautiful lace trims along the hem.
meanings.sent2: She added golden trims to the curtains for a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent3: The trims on the pillowcases matched the bedspread perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The trims on the tablecloth sparkled in the candlelight.
meanings.sent5: The trims on the costume made it stand out on stage.

meanings.definition: To adjust or balance the sails of a ship
meanings.sent1: The sailor trims the sails to catch the wind more effectively.
meanings.sent2: He trims the sails to ensure the ship moves smoothly through the water.
meanings.sent3: The captain trims the sails expertly, guiding the ship through the storm.
meanings.sent4: She trims the sails skillfully, maximizing the ship's speed.
meanings.sent5: Trims the sails carefully to navigate the ship safely through the rough seas.

meanings.definition: To decorate or embellish with a finishing touch
meanings.sent1: She trims the cake with delicate icing flowers.
meanings.sent2: He trims the gift with a bow before presenting it.
meanings.sent3: The artist trims the painting with a gold frame.
meanings.sent4: She trims the outfit with a statement necklace.
meanings.sent5: He trims the garden with fairy lights for a magical touch.
